game.name: Eccentricity
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Eccentricity casts you as an eccentric collector assembling a steampunk power grid from bizarre contraptions.Buy, rotate, and arrange your acquisitions to forge powerful synergies, managing energy, heat, money, and space as your quota climbs ever higher.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eccentricity casts you as an eccentric collector assembling a steampunk power grid from bizarre contraptions.Buy, rotate, and arrange your acquisitions to forge powerful synergies, managing energy, heat, money, and space as your quota climbs ever higher.
